site_name: Boot Court75 - 77 Jeddo RoadLondonW12 9ED
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning application reference: 2023/00171/FUL allowed on appeal reference: APP/H5390/W/24/3348144 dated 4th December 2024 for the "Change of use of the ground floor and southern part of first floor from commercial (Class E) into 5no. self-contained flats (Class C3), consisting of 4 x 2 bedroom and 1 x 1 bedroom self-contained flats; replacement of 3no. single doors with new windows fronting Jeddo Road; removal of part of the existing roof to the eastern elevation of unit 2; alterations within the internal courtyard and associated works." Amendments sought are adjustment to existing brickwork boundary wall and installation of MS railing painted black to form front garden areas to Units 1 and 4; and installation of 2no. flat rooflights to bathroom areas in Unit 3.
